messages.msgSnippet: I was sent this link today... by one of my daughters schooled friends... she said it reminded her of our radical family... I have to admit I was proud :) my
messages.messageBody:
I was sent this link today... by one of my daughters schooled
friends... she said it reminded her of our 'radical' family... I have
to admit I was proud :) my only wish was it could have been done
without the 'off color' language... anyway... thought I would share..

value="http://www.youtube com/v/k8x14cLGh5 o&rel=1"></param><param
name="wmode" value="transparent" ></param> <embed
src="http://www.youtube com/v/k8x14cLGh5 o&rel=1" type="application/ x-
shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425"
height="355" ></embed> </object>
